from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
import logging
import time
import csv
import sys



# Read the data
df = spark.read.parquet("abfss://dl-juror-eric-voters-temp@baubaisadfsastg.dfs.core.windows.net/2025-03-24")

# Coalesce to a single partition
df_single = df.coalesce(1)

filtered_df = df_single.filter(col("creation_date") == "20231204")
# Save Pandas DataFrame to CSV
filtered_pd_df = filtered_df.toPandas()
csv_file = "filtered_data.csv"
filtered_pd_df.to_csv(csv_file, index=False)

# Upload CSV to Azure Blob Storage
storage_account = "baubaisadfsastg"
blob_container = 'f"abfss://juror-etl@{storage_account}.dfs.core.windows.net/postgresql-batch'

with open(csv_file, "rb") as data:
    blob_container.upload_blob(data)

print("CSV file uploaded successfully.")
